description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              •	Oversees the preparation of kitchen equipment for use
              
              •	Manages the receiving and storage of kitchen goods
              
              •	Oversees the cleaning and storage of kitchen equipment
              
              •	Oversees the removal of waste
              
              •	Oversees the handling of kitchen linen
              
              •	Maintains a hygienic kitchen
              
              •	Cleans the kitchen and equipment
              
              •	Maintains high level of personal hygiene enforce hygiene standards for the team
              
              •	Manages all functions to achieve the optimum departmental costs
              
              •	Manages all functions of the department to achieve a maximum level of sanitation
              
              •	Assists the Director of Food and Beverage and the Executive Chef in developing training plans, developing training material in accordance with IHG guidelines and implement training plans for department
              
              •	Conducts daily briefings and other meetings as needed to obtain optimal results
              
              •	Handle administrative works and keeps up-dated files on the stewarding department
              
              •	Assists the Director of Food and Beverage and the Executive Chef in settings stewarding goals  and developing strategies, procedures and policies
              
              •	Determines minimum and maximum stocks and controls the par-stocks of all material and equipment
              
              •	Liaises with the Purchasing Manager and suppliers for any purchase needed
              
              •	Conducts inventories in coordination with employees of the accounting division
              
              •	Liaises with employees of the Engineering Division to schedule preventive maintenance and repairs
              
              •	Monitors local competitors and compare their operation with his operation
              
              •	Works with Executive Chef in the preparation and management of the Department’s budget
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              Required Skills
              
              • Demonstrated ability to interact with customers, employees and third parties that reflects highly on the hotel, the brand and the Company.
              
              • Problem solving, reasoning, motivating, organizational and training abilities.
              
              Qualifications
              
              • Diploma or Vocational Certificate in Culinary Skills or related field.
              

              Experience
              
              • 1 year  related experience including at least 2 years in supervisory capacity or an equivalent combination of education and experience.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
